items.sentence: Tom was lying flat on his back on a hospital bed.
I'd be surprised if Tom could do that by himself.
Blue whales are the largest animals in the world.
Tom was very angry even though he didn't show it.
Tom admitted everything when Mary confronted him.
This is the tallest building that I've ever seen.
If you don't like that, you don't have to eat it.
I rung the bell countless times, but nobody came.
I like visiting places I've never been to before.
If you come in second, you'll get a silver medal.
